description: Text commentary of the Ulster derby between Donegal and Derry at Ballybofey and updates from Tyrone's encounter against Galway.
title: National Football League: Donegal v Derry live text and score updates from Galway v Tyrone
title_page: National Football League: Donegal v Derry live text and score updates from Galway v Tyrone - BBC Sport
maintext:
That's a wrap!
Two gripping games for you this afternoon with Donegal fighting back to defeat derby rivals Derry while Tyrone earn a draw away against Galway.
We hope you enjoyed it but that's all from us for now, you can find the reports from both games as well as reaction on the BBC Sport website.
Thanks for your company.
Full-time
Donegal 1-22 Derry 1-19
Donegal come from eight points down with 15 left to play to make it four wins from five in Division One as Derry are left with a single point with two games to play.
A huge crowd here in Ballyshannon go home happy.
Report and reaction to follow.
